DOC.brief_summary: Study Design : Allocation : 2 arm Intervention Model : Single Group Assignment Masking : Open Label Primary Purpose : Treatment Detailed Description The utilization Foley catheter induction labor well establish . There two technique readily use place Foley catheter . The common method direct visualization cervix sterile speculum examination method place catheter digital cervical examination . Studies report use rigid stylette ( thin wire insert catheter maintain rigidity ) guide insertion Foley catheter decrease failure rate . The Foley catheter plus rigid stylette technique seem efficient safe method labor induction . However , knowledge study assess difference standard digital placement Foley catheter versus digital placement Foley catheter stylette .
DOC.detailed_description: Outcomes : Primary Outcome Measures : • The duration insertion Foley catheter group without stylette . Secondary Outcome Measures : • Pain assess visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , woman randomly allocate rigid stylette rigid stylette placement Foley catheter induction labor . Tertiary Outcome Measure : • Compare failure rate placement Foley catheter induction labor woman randomly allocate rigid stylette rigid stylette Design Methods : The decision proceed induction labor Foley catheter make attend obstetrician caring patient . Women require induction labor consent study need induction confirm . After obtain informed consent , nurse involved patient care notify patient 's participation study . Random assignment either Foley bulb 5 French stylette versus without achieve resident physician select next seal , opaque envelope contain assignment information . The envelope show randomization number outside . Envelopes keep Labor Delivery ward . It impossible perform physician patient blind condition study due instrument need different technique . The perform physician decide prior envelop selection resident physician obtain patient 's Bishop Score . A 22 French Foley catheter use group study . A 5 French stylette ( also know rigid catheter guide urethral manipulator use TVT procedure ) use group assign stylette . Pre-induction cervical examination assessment Bishop score do OB/GYN resident physician ( PGY 2-4 ) labor delivery ward . Insertion technique Foley bulb without 5 French stylette start way . The patient place dorsal lithotomy position . The labor bed disassembled normal fashion do labor patient foot bed remove . The patient 's foot place foot rest . The OB/GYN resident ( PGY 2-4 ) perform vaginal examination identify internal o . The Foley catheter , without stylette , guide examiner 's hand endocervix . When Foley balloon past internal o , balloon inflate 50cc normal saline . The Foley catheter place gentle traction tap right medial thigh patient . Gentle traction reapplied every 30-60 minute reapplication tape right medial thigh Registered Nurse . This continued expulsion Foley balloon maximum duration 12-24 hour . After expulsion Foley balloon , induction labor carry oxytocin infusion and/or artificial rupture membranes.. If Foley catheter remove 24 hour status post insertion , procedure count failed induction labor Foley catheter method induction continue ( i.e . Misoprostol , Artificial rupture membrane , Oxytocin , etc. ) . The time begin start vaginal examination placement Foley catheter end balloon fill completely saline . Timeframe : Participants enrol April 2013 January 2014 successfully enrol 128 ( 64 per group ) participant study . Data collect throughout duration study allow information hospital stay enter patient 's medical record . Data analysis occur January 2014 February 2014 . Data presentation could occur 2 year complete study . Data Collection : The following variable record : Age ; Race ( 0=NA ; 1=Caucasian ; 2=African American/Black ; 3=Hispanic ; 4=Asian 5=Other ) ; BMI ; Gravidity Parity ; Gestational Age ; Reason Indication Induction ( 0=NA ; 1=Post-term pregnancy ; 2=Spontaneous Rupture Membranes ; 3=Maternal disease ; 4=Fetal indication ; 5=Psychosocial parameter ; 6= In vitro fertilization ; 7=Advanced maternal age ; 8 Maternal Request ; 9=Other ) ; History Previous Cesarean Deliveries ; Diabetes mellitus ( 0=NA ; 1=Type I ; 2=Type II ; 3=Prediabetes ; 4=GDM ) ; Hypertensive disorder ( 0=NA ; 1=Chronic HTN ; 2= Gestational HTN ; 3=Mild Preeclampsia ; 4=Severe Preeclampsia ; 5=Eclampsia ) ; Renal Disease ( 0=No ; 1=Yes ) ; Other Comorbidities ( 0=No ; 1=Yes ) ; Documented Chorioamnionitis ( 0=No ; 1=Yes ) ; Epidural ( 0=No ; 1=Yes ) ; Inadvertent Rupture Membranes ( 0=No ; 1=Yes ) ; Type Delivery ; Pain Assessment ( 0-10 ) ; Patient Satisfaction ; Type Delivery . Points time record : Time insertion ( Placement Foley catheter ) ; Time expulsion catheter ; Time take place catheter ; Time oxytocin start ; Time oxytocin end ; Duration treatment ( Insertion expulsion ) ; Duration induction ( induction delivery ) ; Duration oxytocin . All variable record Excel spreadsheet resident physician study coordinator . See attached example .
DOC.criteria: Singleton fetus Cephalic presentation Indicated PostEstimated Date Confinement Induction labor Bishop score < 5 Low lie placenta Undiagnosed vaginal bleeding History induction preinduction agent pregnancy Signs symptom infection ( i.e . Maternal fever ) Rupture membranes Multiple gestation Women urgent emergent clinical situation medical staff care patient determines obtain consent would interfere patient 's clinical care
